casebody.data:
In the Matter of Nina Kane, on Her Own Behalf and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Appellant, v Henry G. Parry, Jr., as Commissioner of the Orange County Department of Social Services, et al., Respondents. In the Matter of Minette Boerum, Appellant, v Henry G. Parry, Jr., as Commissioner of the Orange County Department of Social Services, et al., Respondents. *1054Submitted April 11, 1977; decided April 28, 1977

Reported below, 55 AD2d 678.

Motion to dismiss the appeals herein for mootness denied.
